document.docAuthor: Zhang, Ruilei, Song, Chao, Qi, Xin & Wang, Xinhua
document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomic review on the subgenus Tripodura Townes (Diptera: Chironomidae: Polypedilum) from China with eleven new species and a supplementary world checklist

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Taxonomic review on the subgenus Tripodura Townes (Diptera: Chironomidae: Polypedilum) from China with eleven new species and a supplementary world checklist

heading.emphasis:
Key to male imagines of
Polypedilum ( Tripodura ) Townes
from China

paragraph.keyLead: 1 . Tergite IX without lateral projections or shoulders............................................................ 2
- Tergite IX with lateral projections or conspicuous shoulders.................................................... 9

2 . Anal point elongation extremely reduced..................................
P. ( T. ) conghuaense Zhang & Wang
sp. n.

4 . AR 0.80 , terminal scale of front tibia oval and apically rounded, superior volsella with 3–5 long apical setae.............................................................................................
P . ( T .) masudai (Tokunaga)

- AR 1.32–1.66 , terminal scale of front tibia triangular and apically pointed, superior volsella with 2 long apical setae......................................................................................
P. ( T. ) udominutum Niitsuma

5 . Wing without markings, anal lobe reduced...............................
P . ( T .) absensilobum Zhang & Wang
sp. n.

6 . Superior volsella spatulated and inferior volsella with less than 5 setae...............................
P . ( T .) spathum Zhang & Wang
- Superior volsella pad-like and inferior volsella with more than 10 setae........................................... 7

7 . Terminal scale of fore tibia pointed, distal margin of superior volsella with 2–3 setae, anal point broad, distal part of r 4 + 5 clear.................................................................................................................................
P . ( T .) japonicum (Tokunaga)

- Terminal scale of fore tibia rounded, distal margin of superior volsella with more than 19 setae, anal point spatula-shaped api- cally, distal part of r 4 + 5 cloudy............................................................................ 8

8 . Anal point with 6 setae at base, superior volsella goblet-shaped; gonostylus slender and apex narrowed......................................................................................................................................
P . ( T .) cypellum Qi et al .

- Anal point with 2 rows of short setae on dorsal lamella, each row with 8−10 setae; superior volsella pediform; gonostylus moderately broad, apex not narrowed......................................................................
P . ( T .) harteni Andersen & Mendes

9 . Anal point slender and almost parallel-sided, spot in cell m 1 + 2 proximal to spot in cell r 4 + 5 ........
P . ( T .) unifascia (Tokunaga)
- Anal point broad or apically expanded, spot in cell m 1 + 2 not proximal to spot in cell r 4 + 5 or wing without marking........ 10

10 . Wing without markings, superior volsella slender and S-shaped..........................
P . ( T .) procerum Zhang et al .

- Wing with markings, usually boldly marked with several dark spots and clouds, sometimes faint and restricted to a few areas; superior volsella not S-shaped........................................................................... 11

12 . Wing marking faint, without spot in cell r 4 + 5 , superior volsella sickle-shaped..........................
P . ( T .) falcatum Zhang et al .
- Wing with 1 spot in cell r 4 + 5 , superior volsella not sickle-shaped................................................ 13

13 . Fore tibial scale rounded apically....................................................
P . ( T .) scalaenum (Schrank)

14 . Lateral projections of anal point strongly sclerotized and without microtrichia, the superior volsella clavate...............................................................................
P . ( T .) nudiprostatum Zhang, Wang & Saether
- Lateral projections of anal point covered with microtrichiae, the superior volsella trapezium-shaped or pad-like......... 15

15 . The superior volsella trapezium-shaped, wing cloudy on distal margin.............
P . ( T .) trapezium Zhang & Wang
sp. n.
- The superior volsella pad-like, wing clear on distal margin.................................................... 16

16 . Gonostylus slender and parallel-sided basal 1 / 4 , lateral projection of anal point slender, marking in cell m 1 + 2 long and opposite to marking in cell r 4 + 5 ....................................................
P . ( T .) parallelum Zhang & Wang
sp. n.

- Gonostylus not as above, lateral projection of anal point broad, marking in cell m 1 + 2 long and distal to marking in cell r 4 + 5 .................................................................................
P . ( T .) quadriguttatum Kieffer

18 . AR 1.80–1.95 , superior volsella pad-like......................................
P . ( T .) decematoguttatum (Tokunaga)

- AR 0.70–0.75 , superior volsella clavate..................................
P . ( T .) mengmanense Zhang & Wang
sp. n.

19 . Setae on vein R 4 + 5 less than 7 and situated distal 1 / 3 to apex.................
P . ( T .) apiculusetosum Zhang & Wang
sp. n.
- Setae on vein R 4 + 5 more than 15 and situated from basal 1 / 4 to apex............................................ 20

21 . Superior volsella toe-like, narrowed in the middle, covered with microtrichia and with 3 apical setae...........................................................................................
P . ( T .) pollicium Zhang & Wang
sp. n.

- Superior volsella slightly curved and gradually tapering to apex, with 2 strong spines directed inwards in middle and 1 outer sub-apical setae..............................................................
P . ( T .) bispinum Zhang & Wang

22 . AR more than 1.10 , the superior volsella with 6–7 apical setae.......................
P . ( T .) cochlearum Zhang & Wang
- AR less than 0.80 , the superior volsella with 1–3 apical setae................................................. 23

23 . The gonostylus expanded in the middle and bent like a bow......................
P . ( T .) arcuatum Zhang & Wang
sp. n.

24 . The spots in cell m 1 + 2 dark and cloudy on wing distal margin.....................
P. ( T. ) bilamella Zhang & Wang
sp. n.
- The spots in cell m 1 + 2 faint and clear on wing distal margin.................................................... 25

25 . AR 0.61 . Superior volsella with 2 long apical setae. Anal point with transparent lobes in middle part........................................................................................
P . ( T .) napahaiense Zhang & Wang
sp. n.

- AR 0.28-0.40 . Superior volsella with 1 long apical seta. Anal point lanceolate, without transport transparent lobe in middle part.......................................................................
P . ( T .) dengae Zhang & Wang
sp. n.
